SELECT a.user_no as id, a.user_id as loginId, a.user_name as name, a.email as email, a.phone as phone, a.active as active, group_concat(c.name) as roles, d.name as company FROM user_info a INNER JOIN user_roles b ON a.user_no=b.user_no INNER JOIN roles_info c ON b.roles_info_id=c.id INNER JOIN company_info d ON a.company_info_id=d.id
AND (a.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.name}, '%') OR a.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.name}, '%') OR d.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.name}, '%'))
GROUP BY a.user_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_approve_log (user_no, prev_active, reg_user_no, reg_date) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{user.active}, #{loginUserNo}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET active = #{request.status}, status_chg_user_no = #{loginUserNo}, status_chg_date = NOW(), upd_user_no = #{loginUserNo}, upd_date = NOW() WHERE user_no = #{user.id}

INSERT INTO user_roles (user_no, roles_info_id) SELECT #{userNo}, id FROM roles_info
#{name}
UPDATE user_info SET upd_user_no = #{loginUserNo}, upd_date = NOW() WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
